thread.section_title: Brilliance.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brilliance.com | www.brilliance.com
thread.title: Eugene Slickers

author: Eugene Slickers
title: Eugene Slickers
text: Like many other guys, I felt the pressure of choosing the right ring. One of the many reasons I chose Brilliance was the real time chat feature on their website. It was great to bounce questions off real people. The other thing worth mentioning is the degree of caution I took when making such a big purchase over the Internet. The customer service and communication was great which made the transition as smooth as could be. Finally, the most important thing, the ring arrived on time and look fantastic. If I could repeat the process over again, I wouldn't change a thing. Thanks Brillance!
